definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The farmer exchanged his cow for five goats.
sentences.chinese: 这个农民用他的牛换了五头羊。

sentences.english: Comments, industry leader who also makes no secret of their endeavors.
sentences.chinese: 言谈中，行业领头羊们也毫不讳言各自的努力方向。

sentences.english: "That sheep is the grandfather of all the best pedigree Dolans in the region, " said Mr Liu.
sentences.chinese: 这头羊是当地所有良种刀郎羊的祖父。

sentences.english: They had lost 45 sheep and a guard dog.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾经丢失了45头羊和一条警卫犬。

sentences.english: Nowaday China is the real head of the world.
sentences.chinese: 现今中国己经是真正地世界领头羊了。

sentences.english: Alabama is now college football's number-one-ranked team.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉巴马大学现在成为了大学橄榄球联赛的领头羊。

sentences.english: Paris remains the bellwether of fashion industry.
sentences.chinese: 在服装行业，巴黎仍然保持着领头羊的地位。

sentences.english: The International Federation is spearheading development initiatives in volunteering development.
sentences.chinese: 联合会将作为志愿者发展的领头羊。

sentences.english: Johannesburg is also known as the economic engine of Southern Africa and the trendsetter of South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 约翰内斯堡也被称作是南非的经济的发动机和领头羊。

sentences.english: When he’s done, he goes to China and becomes the top man there.
sentences.chinese: 称霸之后，他又移师中国，十年成为业界领头羊。

sentences.english: Top would be fine, but to be near the top would mean the run-in would present us with an opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 头名当然好，但紧追领头羊意味着我们还有机会。

sentences.english: Iowa is the leader in the use of ethanol-blended gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 爱荷华州是使用乙醇混合型燃油的领头羊。

sentences.english: In the Hilcok village Hilock township Queshan mounty, there's a goat called "Goat Strong".
sentences.chinese: 确山县瓦岗乡瓦岗村有头羊叫做“羊坚强”。

sentences.english: Nowaday China is the real head of the world.
sentences.chinese: 现今中国已经是真正的世界领头羊了。

sentences.english: In just a decade or two another country will be playing first violin in the orchestra of the chocolate nations - Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 在未来的岁月中，瑞士将成为巧克力业的领头羊。

sentences.english: Now we have become the leading company in POP SWEET industry.
sentences.chinese: 目前已成为跳跳糖行业的领头羊。

definition: (of a livestock animal) plump and strong/well-fed
